name: Marriott's Canyon Villas at Desert Ridge

reviews.title: Very enjoyable experience
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay there.The staff was super and the condos were nicel decorated with all the amenities you could want. The pool with it's wateralls was beautiful. Sitting nder the misters helped with the heat. Nice golf course - we didn't use it though. Would definitely go back.
This property is immaculate with a true south-west feel.
reviews.title: Awesome property...SO relaxing!

likes.liked: — beautiful part of the country, so relaxing

reviews.text: We stayed in 2 bedroom unit overlooking the pool and found it quiet and scenic. The 3rd floor allows views of the mountains and desert.
reviews.title: Great Resort!!

reviews.text: The Desert Ridge Mall is so close but in the heat it is certainly too far to walk with groceries. Albertsons Groceries has everything.
